string.text: This empty flask is not much to look at. You have a strange feeling that throwing it away would improve the aesthetics somewhat; might as well fill it with something first. \n \n

Military flask filled with dirty water. You can purify it with «Akvatabs» or by boiling. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
